review: The Chopin tour was a perfect blend of history and music. The monastery gardens were beautiful.
The vintage train ride was charming, but the tour could have included more stops.
The wine tour was excellent! Learned so much about local wine production.
The Caves of Drach were absolutely breathtaking! The underground lake concert was a magical experience.
The Tramuntana Mountain Tour was challenging but rewarding. The views were spectacular!
The Roman Ruins Tour was fascinating. Our guide was very knowledgeable about the history.
The pearl making process was fascinating to watch. Bought some beautiful souvenirs!
The Cathedral & Old Town Tour was perfect! The architecture was stunning.
The Formentor Peninsula Tour was amazing! The lighthouse and beaches were beautiful.
